Listing 13.12: Example of grid searching SARIMA models for the monthly mean temperature
dataset.
Running the example may take a while on modern hardware. Model conﬁgurations and the
RMSE are printed as the models are evaluated. The top three model conﬁgurations and their
error are reported at the end of the run. A truncated example of the results from running the
hyperparameter grid search are listed below.
